V03vinv16_u:558: yaḥ saṃghasya nānāvādo vivādo vipratyanīkavādaḥ asāmagrī asaṃmodamāna anekotībhāvaḥ tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ; 4)
V03vinv16_u:561: yo 'navavādas tad adhikaraṇaṃ yad vā adhikaraṇaṃ so 'navavādaḥ?
V03vinv16_u:569: trīṇy adhikaraṇāni vivādādhikaraṇam āpattyadhikaraṇaṃ kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ ca; 3)
V03vinv16_u:571: yaḥ saṃghasyānavavādaḥ anavavādaṃ anavavādaprasthāpanaṃ tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ; 4)
V03vinv16_u:574: yā āpattis tad adhikaraṇaṃ yad vā adhikaraṇaṃ sā āpattiḥ?
V03vinv16_u:579: āpattis tāvan nādhikaraṇaṃ pañcāpattijātayaḥ āpattinikāyā āpattiskandha ity ucyate pārājikāḥ saṃghāvaśeṣāḥ pāyattikā pratideśanikā duṣkṛtāś ca; 2)
V03vinv16_u:581: trīṇy adhikarāṇāni vivādādhikaraṇam anavavādādhikaraṇaṃ kṛtyādhikaraṇaṃ ca; 3)
V03vinv16_u:584: pārājikā saṃghāvaśeṣā pāyattikā pratideśanikā duṣkṛtāś ca;
V03vinv16_u:589: yat kṛtyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ yad vā adhikaraṇaṃ tat kṛtyam?
V03vinv16_u:595: yaḥ saṃghasya jñaptir jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma; 2)
V03vinv16_u:597: trīṇy adhikaraṇāni vivādādhikaraṇaṃ anavavādādhikaraṇam āpattyadhikaraṇaṃ ca; 3)
V03vinv16_u:599: yā saṃghasya kriyājñaptir jñaptidvitīyaṃ jñapticaturthaṃ karma tad upādāya yaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho ḥvivādaḥḥ; 4)
V03vinv16_u:604: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana settle a dispute
V03vinv16_u:605: vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhikṣavaḥ katibhir adhikaraṇaśamathair dharmair damayitavyaṃ śamayitavyaṃ vyupaśamayitavyam?
V03vinv16_u:608: kathaṃ saṃmukhavinaya adhikaraṇaśamatho bhavati kathaṃ caiṣām adhikaraṇānām damaś ca bhavati śamaś ca vyupaśamaś ca,
V03vinv16_u:610: buddho bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ varśā upagato jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme;
V03vinv16_u:611: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapade varśā upagatāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:612: teśām antarvarṣo utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:613: tais tad adhikaraṇam āyuṣmantayoḥ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor upanikṣiptam;
V03vinv16_u:614: tābhyaṃ tad adhikaraṇam vyupaśamitaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:615: atha sambahulā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitās trayāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarā samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena śrāvastīṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:617: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:618: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:620: buddhā bhagavantaḥ āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā pratisaṃmodate,
V03vinv16_u:621: kuto yūyaṃ bhikṣava etarhy āgacchata kutra vā varṣoṣitāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:626: janapadād vayaṃ bhadanta etarhy āgacchāmo janapade ca smo varṣā uṣitāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:627: kaccid yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sukhasparśaṃ janapade varṣā uṣitā na cāstha klāntā piṇḍakena?
V03vinv16_u:628: na hi vayam bhadanta janapade sukhasparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na ca sma klāntā piṇḍakena,
V03vinv16_u:629: api tv asmākam antarvarṣeṇa utpannaḥ kalaho bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho vivādaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:630: tair asmābhis tad adhikaraṇam āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyām (Adhik-v 80)
V03vinv16_u:632: tābhyaṃ tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena ca
V03vinv16_u:636: śakṣyanti bata me sthalasthāḥ śrāvakāḥ utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayituṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:637: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sthalasthair bhikṣubhir utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitavyāni dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena iti;
V03vinv16_u:638: bhikṣavo na jānate ke sthalasthāḥ kati vā iti;
V03vinv16_u:640: ye śaknuvanti saṃgham antareṇa utpannotpannāny adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:642: asti sthalastho na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā;
V03vinv16_u:645: katamo na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā?
V03vinv16_u:646: yathāpitat sthalastho bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānām bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānām ātmanā upasaṃkramyaivam āhā:
V03vinv16_u:647: sādhv āyuṣmantaḥ idam adhikaraṇam sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītam;
V03vinv16_u:648: susaṃprayuktaṃ na duṣprayuktaṃ suparāmṛṣṭaṃ na duṣparāmṛṣṭam idaṃ ca idam ca vadata idaṃ ca idam ca mā vakṣyatha;
V03vinv16_u:651: vayam āyuṣmatām pakṣo balam sahāyakā iti dvitīyam api pakṣam ātmanaivopasaṃkramyaivam (A 339a)
V03vinv16_u:652: āha: sādhv āyuṣmanta idam adhikaraṇam sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītaṃ susaṃprayuktam na duṣprayuktam suparāmṛṣṭaṃ na duṣparāmṛṭam idaṃ ca idaṃ ca vadata idaṃ ca idaṃ ca mā vakṣyatha;
V03vinv16_u:655: vayam āyuṣmatām pakṣo balaṃ sahāyakā iti;
V03vinv16_u:656: ayaṃ sthalasthaḥ na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā;
V03vinv16_u:657: katamaḥ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā?
V03vinv16_u:659: vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam āpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānām ekasmin pakṣe nātmanā upasaṃkrāmati api tu dūtam anupreṣayati:
V03vinv16_u:660: sādhv āyuṣmanta etad adhikaraṇaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītaṃ susaṃprayuktaṃ na duṣprayuktaṃ suparāmṛṣṭaṃ na duṣparāmṛṣṭam;
V03vinv16_u:661: idaṃ cedaṃ ca vadata idaṃ cedaṃ ca mā vakṣayatha,
V03vinv16_u:664: vayam āyuṣmatāṃ pakṣo bala sahāyakā iti;
V03vinv16_u:666: api tu dūtam anupreṣayati sādhv āyuṣmantaḥ etad adhikaraṇaṃ sūdgṛhītaṃ na durgṛhītaṃ susaṃprayuktaṃ na duṣprayuktaṃ suparāmṛṣṭaṃ na duṣparāmṛṣṭam;
V03vinv16_u:667: idaṃ cedaṃ ca vadata idaṃ cedaṃ ca mā vakṣyatha,
V03vinv16_u:670: vayam āyuṣmatām pakṣo balaṃ sahāyakā iti;
V03vinv16_u:671: ḥ ayaṃ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā;
V03vinv16_u:672: katamaḥ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto vācā ca;
V03vinv16_u:673_0: yathāpitat sthalastho bhikṣūṇāṃ kalahajātānāṃ bhaṇḍanajātānāṃ vigṛhītānāṃ vivādam
V03vinv16_u:673_1: āpannānāṃ pakṣāparapakṣavyavasthitānām ekasmin pakṣe nātmanā upasaṃkrāmati nāpi dūtam anupreṣayati,
V03vinv16_u:674: dvitīyam api nātmanopasaṃkrāmati nāpi dūtam anupreṣayati
V03vinv16_u:675: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalastho na kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ; (A 339b)
V03vinv16_u:677: evaṃrūpaṃ hi sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāni cādhikaraṇāny utpadyante utpannāni ca na kṣipraṃ vyupaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:678: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto na vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśāyitavyah;
V03vinv16_u:680: evaṃrūpam api sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāny adhikaraṇāny utpadyante utpannāni ca kṣipraṃ ḥnaḥ vyupaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:681: tatra yo 'yaṃ sthalasthaḥ kāyena saṃvṛto vācā ca evaṃrūpaḥ sthalasthaḥ asaṃmataḥ saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś nāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:683: evaṃrūpaṃ sthalastham āgamya saṃghe 'nutpannāny adhikaraṇāni notpadyante utpannāni ca kṣipram (Adhik-v 82)
V03vinv16_u:684: eva upaśamaṃ gacchanti dharmeṇa vinyena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:697: yathā ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati sarve te samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtāḥ,
V03vinv16_u:700: yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena tena śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti;
V03vinv16_u:702: sacet sthalasthā bhikṣavaḥ tad adhikaraṇaṃ na śaknuvanti vyupaśamayituṃ tais tad adhikaraṇaṃ saṃghe upanikṣeptavyam,
V03vinv16_u:703: saṃghena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:704: saṃghena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena suvyupaśāntam
V03vinv16_u:715: yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:717: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃukhībhūtā na prativahanti na pratikrośanti;
V03vinv16_u:718: yeṣāṃ prativahatāṃ pratikrośatāṃ pratikrośo ārohati ḥkarmāṇi ca kurvantiḥ idam ucyate saṃghasaṃmukham; (Adhik-v 83)
V03vinv16_u:720: ye tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti yeṣāṃ ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati te sarve samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtā;
V03vinv16_u:723: yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena ḥtenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti,
V03vinv16_u:725: sacet saṃghaḥ na śaknoti tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayituṃ tataḥ ḥpaścātḥ saṃghena vyūḍhakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃmantavyāḥ daśa vā pañca vā;
V03vinv16_u:727: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite pūrvaṃ tāvad utsāhayitavyāḥ:
V03vinv16_u:728: utsahadhve yūyaṃ buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ santo bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitum iti;
V03vinv16_u:729: saced utsahante tair vaktavyam utsahayāma iti;
V03vinv16_u:730: tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyaṃ:
V03vinv16_u:731: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ime buddharakṣitadharmaḥdattaḥsaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ utsahante bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:732: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣameta anujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṅgho buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenān vyūḍhakān saṃmanyeta;
V03vinv16_u:733: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasasenā vyūḍhakā utsahante saṃghasya bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā adhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:736: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ime buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakā utsahante bahiḥ sīkmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayitum;
V03vinv16_u:738: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenāḥ vyūḍhakā bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayiṣyanti;
V03vinv16_u:739: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenān vyūḍhakān saṃmantum:
V03vinv16_u:740: buddharakṣitadharmadattasaṃghasenā vyūḍhakāḥ bahiḥ simāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādikaraṇāni
V03vinv16_u:744: (Adhik-v 84 te ca bahiḥ sīmāṃ gatvā saṃghasyādhikaraṇāni vyupaśamayiṣyanti;
V03vinv16_u:746: evam etad dhārayāmi vyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitavam dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:747: vyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ḥsuḥvyupaśamitaṃ vaktavyaṃ dharmeṇa śāstuḥ śāsanena
V03vinv16_u:756: ye tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayanti yeṣāṃ ca tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati te save samavahitā bhavanti saṃmukhībhūtāḥ;
V03vinv16_u:759: yena dharmeṇa yena vinayena ḥyenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśāmyati tena dharmeṇa tena vinayena ḥtenaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanena tad (A 340b)
V03vinv16_u:762: saced vyūḍhakā bhikṣavaḥ na śaknuvanti tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitum,
V03vinv16_u:763: tair vyūḍhakavyūḍhakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃmantavyā aṣṭau vā nava vā;
V03vinv16_u:764: vyūḍhavyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayitavyaṃ dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsanena;
V03vinv16_u:765: vyūḍhakavyūḍhakais tad adhikaraṇam vyupaśamitaṃ suvyupaśamitaṃ vaktavyam;
V03vinv16_u:766: saced vyūḍhakavyūdhakā bhikṣavaḥ tad adhikaraṇaṃ na śaknuvanti vyupaśamayituṃ tais tad adhikaraṇaṃ saṃghe upanikṣeptavyam;
V03vinv16_u:767: tataḥ saṃghenādhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣuḥ saṃmantavyaḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ;
V03vinv16_u:768: adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:770: chandād gacchati dveṣān mohād bhayād gacchati saṃcāritāsaṃcāritaṃ cādhikaraṇaṃ na jānāti;
V03vinv16_u:771: ebhiḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:772: pañcabhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmataś ca saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś ca nāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:774: na chandād gacchati na dveṣān na mohān na bhayād gacchati; (Adhik-v 85)
V03vinv16_u:776: ebhiḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur asaṃmataś ca saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś ca nāvakāśayitavyaḥ;
V03vinv16_u:778: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭhavācikayā bhikṣūn smanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ḥpūrvaṃ tāvad utsāhayitavyāḥ:
V03vinv16_u:780: saced utsahante tair vaktavyam utsahayāma iti;
V03vinv16_u:781: tataḥ paścādḥ ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam:
V03vinv16_u:782: śrṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ayam evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur utsahate saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ saṃcārayitum;
V03vinv16_u:783: sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣameta anujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃgha evaṃnāmānam adhikaraṇasaṃcārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃmanyeta,
V03vinv16_u:788: ayam evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣur utsahate saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ saṃcārayitum;
V03vinv16_u:789: tat saṃgha evaṃnāmānam adhikaraṇasaṃcārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃmanyeta evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣuḥ saṃghasyādhikaraṇaṃ saṃcārayiṣyati;
V03vinv16_u:790: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate evaṃnāmānam adhikaraṇasaṃcārakaṃ bhikṣum saṃmantum,
V03vinv16_u:793: bhāṣantām; saṃmataḥ saṃghena evaṃnāmā adhikaraṇasaṃcārako bhikṣuḥ; so 'yaṃ (A 341a)
V03vinv16_u:796: etad dhārayāmi adhikaraṇasaṃcārakasyāhaṃ bhikṣor āsamudācarikān dharmān prajñāpayāmi;
V03vinv16_u:797: adhikaraṇasaṃcārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā idam adhikaraṇam sasthavire saprātimokṣe saṃghe upanikṣeptavyaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ cārocayitavyam;

V03vinv16_u:1575: sthaviraḥ sthavirānyatamaḥ jñāto jñātānyatamaḥ pramukaḥ pramukhānyatamaḥ tena svapakṣe upasaṃkramya idaṃ syād vacanīyam:

V03vinv16_u:1578: yāṃ cāham āyuṣmanto 'smin vastuni āpattim āpanno yāṃ ca yūyam,

V03vinv16_u:1583: teṣām asmākam āyuṣmanta alābhā na lābhāḥ durlabdhā na sulabdhāḥ,
V03vinv16_u:1584: ye vayam svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya kalahajātā viharāmo bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādam āpannāḥ;
